entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
